price: دلته نو ټوله واكمني الله لره ثابته شوه، هماغه (الله) هم په ثواب (وركولو) كې غوره دى او هم په انجام كې.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: hunālika al-walāyatu lillahi al-ḥaqi huwa khayrun thawāban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
